author: james doig
comment: Bought this and found out the hard way I couldnt use it with my Gear 2.
title: Doesnt work with samsung gear 2

author: Kjell J
comment: Beautiful face but needs weather.

author: Dejan Josifovic
comment: Very nice   Only missing weather application.

i very much enjoy this watchface. Looks cool on my asus zenwatch 2.Never had one so detailed before. The more disapointing to find out that The lines and details in ambient mode are pixelated and partly undefined and even invisible. Really hope you will fix that in future but hey thanks anyway for The good job allready. Greetz Cliff
title: Almost perfect

author: Dwight Boone
comment: The developer is awesome. I had an issue loading watchface and they worked with to the tune of eight emails or so until they fixed my problem! Bravo. Customer service is still alive and well!
title: DB47

author: Melissa Baatz
comment: I like this so far but don't understand why there is a minute and seconds hand section when we have the digital time. It would be nice if there was an option to have just the hour above the date instead of the digital time.  Also needs more customization and colors
title: Good

author: Sean Lechner
comment: Buttons don't work well and the interface becomes boring pretty much immediately when you can't do much altering.
title: Looks nice, but that is it

author: I Ian
comment: Please refund stopped working after 10  mins

author: Atif Ghazi
comment: Useless
title: No full ambient. Refunding.

author: Iman Nt
comment: This watch face is very beautifull

author: Yoni Padan
comment: Unique

author: Lennon Leikam
comment: The image is pixelated where there are fine details. My biggest complaint is that the second ring does not move smoothly and the digital time at the top seems to jerk a bit as the time changes. BUT overall it's a beautiful and unique image with nice color options. I'm hoping the developer will be cleaning up the finer details over time. I'll adjust to a higher rating when they do.

reply.author: BoostApp
reply.content: Hi! Thanks for your review we are planning to update it in a few weeks. Could you, please, provide some more info about your watch model to boost.core1@gmail.com so we can fix it right?

title: Attractive design but lacks detail.

author: JaRed Beats
comment: Whenever I try to change the color of the watchface, tike format etc it doesn't send to the watch and if I hit the back button it doesn't save

reply.author: BoostApp
reply.content: Hello! Could you please provide us with further info via e-mail? What is your watch model,how do you change the setting?

title: Info won't send.

author: Rory E
comment: It's improving, improve Always On, part of the design is pixelated and doesn't look good (Gear Live)

reply.author: BoostApp
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback! We are working on further improvements.

title: Not bad

author: Brian Berzinskis
comment: I like when the developer stands behind a product. I made some suggestions and they were reviewed and addressed. Good work.

reply.author: BoostApp
reply.content:
Hi! Added an option for centered dates. Also the seconds in ambient mode now are always set to zero. Drop them out doesn’t look good.
Try the new update, maybe you could review your rating.

title: Takes Advice

author: M Dub
comment: One of the better watch faces I have ever seen. However, this needs the option to change how long the screen stays on. When I am hanging out at dinner or with my friends I want to be able to set it to always stay on so I can show it off. This only stays on for 5 seconds . It also needs the option to have a colored ambient display. I opted for the refund because I dislike to this so much.
title: Lacks idle control

author: Loren Stuck
comment: That's about it. Date in the center being crooked drives me crazy. Didn't notice it until I put it on the watch. No customizations that I could find. Refunded...

reply.author: BoostApp
reply.content: Hello! Croocked dates are optional now. By default they are straight.

title: Looks good

author: Damian deSouza
comment: Crashes my Huawei watch every few minutes. Un-installing. Please also initiate my refund.

author: Josh Goldberg
comment: Purchased, wasn't available to use. Not shown in app drawer. Refunded.
title: Never showed up

author: Brad Keener
comment: The date is small and crooked.

reply.author: BoostApp
reply.content: Fixed. Now it’s straight. Crooked mode is optional.

title: Small text
